docs.snippet: For some members of the Silver Gull Beach Club, the perfect summer is spent not at the beach, the pool or the cabanas, but on a hot concrete court....
docs.lead_paragraph: For some members of the Silver Gull Beach Club, the perfect summer is spent not at the beach, the pool or the cabanas, but on a hot concrete court.
docs.abstract: Paddle ball holds preeminent place as most popular sport at Silver Gull Beach Club, which acts as Mecca for New York-centric sport; most players hail from south Brooklyn, where sport is prevalent in parks and beach clubs, and love of game is passed down one generation to another (Series: Summer at the Silver Gull).

headline.main: ‘A New York Game’: Where Paddle Ball, Trash Talk Included, Is King
headline.print_headline: What Beach? Leisure Here Is a Hot Game of Paddle Ball

docs.snippet: The suit is the biggest sign yet that youth football programs are the next front in the legal battle over head trauma....
docs.lead_paragraph: The suit is the biggest sign yet that youth football programs are the next front in the legal battle over head trauma.
docs.abstract: Mothers of two deceased former youth football players file class-action lawsuit against Pop Warner, largest youth football league in United States, claiming that organization put players in danger by ignoring risks of concussions; suit represents broadest challenge to youth football, as it also accuses USA Football, NFL's youth football arm, and group in charge of football helmet safety standards, of failing to protect young players.

headline.main: Pop Warner Is Facing a Class-Action Lawsuit Over Concussions
headline.print_headline: Pop Warner Is Facing a Class-Action Lawsuit Over Concussions

docs.snippet: Pent-up demand from the recession may have finally run its course, as August sales fell by 4 percent from a year earlier....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pent-up demand from the recession may have finally run its course, as August sales fell by 4 percent from a year earlier.
docs.abstract: Automakers report larger-than-expected decline in August car sales, signalling industry's six-year growth cycle has peaked; say overall sales fell about 4 percent, but SUV and truck manufacturers experienced rise in demand, bucking trend.

headline.main: Big Decline in U.S. Auto Sales May Signal End of Six-Year Boom
headline.print_headline: Falling Sales of Vehicles  May Signal Boom’s End

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks
